The user covers one leg with wind chakra and delivers a powerful falling kick to her opponent. This kick was powerful enough to slice through a mechanical puppet.

== Trivia ==
* The word {{translation|硬派|kōha}} can also refer to a man obsessed with his appearance, especially emphasising his strength and masculinity, in order to get himself a girl.
